TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sinka, title = Sinka, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sinka} }

S.FORM: Sinka Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitung ko Sinka a niyaro', 18 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 42 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 41 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan88%, roma10%.

Sinka Itiniay i Daren Cen no Taitong ko Sinka a niyaro', 18 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 42 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 41 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan88%, roma10%.
